alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 6:28AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN CRAIGHEAD... NORTHEASTERN POINSETT...NORTHWESTERN MISSISSIPPI AND WEST CENTRAL LAUDERDALE COUNTIES THROUGH 700 AM CST... At 628 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lepanto, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Osceola, Manila, Lake City, Leachville, Lepanto, Bay, Caraway, Luxora, Keiser, Dyess, Dell, Burdette, Little River, Etowah, Black Oak, Victoria, Jolliff Store, Dearman, Eastview, and Lennie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
